title: Amsterdam hotel could take legal action over appearance in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
description: The five-star Conservatorium Hotel doesn't appreciate being the scene of countless virtual gunfights.

title: This solo-developed, Indonesian FPS has the best portals I've seen since Portal
description: Mala Petaka is a striking Doom total conversion with some great level design hooks.

description: Plus, Portal 2's Cave Johnson as an announcer pack.

title: Build big, stupid custom spaceships with friends in Cosmoteer
